name: Cml815.github.io
body:
### Purpose

This ad hoc blog is designed to post important, time-sensitive information related to applying for research and project grant funding. 

### Contact 
For more information about grant opportunities or to share tips, contact Caroline - @cml815 - via private message or at http://www.leopoldwriting.com.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
